showScoreExcerpt:
"Outdated and a little forced...What I got was a domestic comedy that didn't build much, and that ended with a message that was driven home repeatedly from the start...The piece still feels too long and repetitive for what it says...There's something pathetic about a production so eager to celebrate its landmark status and its edgy, challenging darkness by not being remotely edgy or challenging at all, but instead by furthering the careers of some already well-established white dudes.‚Äù
